content.text: Match ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0, Fiorentina 1.
Second Half ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0, Fiorentina 1.
Attempt saved. Khouma Babacar (Fiorentina) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Borja Valero.
Christoph Kramer (Borussia Mönchengladbach) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Jannik Vestergaard (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Borja Valero (Fiorentina) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Jannik Vestergaard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Oscar Wendt.
Corner,  Borussia Mönchengladbach. Conceded by Maximiliano Olivera.
Attempt blocked. Milan Badelj (Fiorentina) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Sebastián Cristóforo (Fiorentina) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Khouma Babacar.
Attempt saved. Khouma Babacar (Fiorentina) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sebastián Cristóforo.
Substitution, Fiorentina. Nenad Tomovic replaces Cristian Tello.
Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Maximiliano Olivera (Fiorentina).
Offside, Fiorentina. Borja Valero tries a through ball, but Khouma Babacar is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Borja Valero (Fiorentina) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Khouma Babacar with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Josip Drmic (Borussia Mönchengladbach) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Oscar Wendt with a cross.
Attempt missed. Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high. Assisted by Christoph Kramer.
Corner,  Borussia Mönchengladbach. Conceded by Milan Badelj.

Oscar Wendt (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sebastián Cristóforo (Fiorentina).
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Julian Korb replaces Fabian Johnson.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. André Hahn replaces Patrick Herrmann.
